variantrule.name: Aegis
entries: {@variantrule Boon|GW2}
While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule Boon|GW2}, the next attack roll made against you automatically misses. The {@variantrule Boon|GW2} then ends.
Stacks duration.
This {@variantrule Boon|GW2} corrupts into 1 stack of {@variantrule Burning|GW2} for 1 round, dealing damage equal to the PB of the creature who corrupted the Boon.

variantrule.name: Bleeding
entries: {@variantrule Condition|GW2}
A bleeding creature takes slashing damage at the start of each of its turns.
The amount of slashing damage is determined by the effect that applied it.
The condition can be ended early by regaining hit points.
Stacks intensity.
This {@variantrule Condition|GW2} get converted into 2 rounds of {@variantrule Vigor|GW2}.

variantrule.name: Blindness
entries: {@variantrule Condition|GW2}
While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule Condition|GW2}, the next attack roll you make automatically misses. The {@variantrule Condition|GW2} then ends.
Stacks duration.
This {@variantrule Condition|GW2} get converted into 1 round of {@variantrule Fury|GW2}.

variantrule.name: Boon
entries: Boons are beneficial effects with a set duration applied by various features.
They are the opposite of {@variantrule Condition|GW2|Conditions}
Each Boon has an associated {@variantrule Condition|GW2}, which it can be corrupted into or converted from.
If a creature already under the effect of a Boon receives the same Boon again, one of two outcomes occurs, depending on the Boon’s properties:
{@bold Stacks Duration:} The Boon’s duration is extended by the duration of the new instance.

{@bold Stacks Intensity:} The Boon’s effects are applied again. Each instance functions independently, with its own duration. If one instance of the Boon becomes corrupted, all active instances become corrupted. Any {@variantrule condition|GW2} imposed by the corruption is applied only once.

variantrule.name: Burning
entries: {@variantrule Condition|GW2}
A burning creature takes fire damage at the start of each of its turns.
The amount of fire damage is determined by the effect that applied it.
The condition can be ended early by using an action to smother the flames.
Stacks intensity.
This {@variantrule Condition|GW2} get converted into 1 round of {@variantrule Aegis|GW2}.

variantrule.name: Condition
entries: Conditions are detrimental effects with a set duration applied by various features.
They are the opposite of {@variantrule Boon|GW2|Boons}
Each Condition has an associated {@variantrule Boon|GW2}, which it can be converted into or corrupted from.
If a creature already under the effect of a Condition receives the same Condition again, one of two outcomes occurs, depending on the Condition’s properties:
{@bold Stacks Duration:} The Condition’s duration is extended by the duration of the new instance.

{@bold Stacks Intensity:} The Condition’s effects are applied again. Each instance functions independently, with its own duration. If one instance of the Condition becomes converted, all active instances become converted. Any {@variantrule Boon|GW2} imposed by the conversion is applied only once.

variantrule.name: Fury
entries: {@variantrule Boon|GW2}
While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule Boon|GW2}, the number you need to roll to score a critical hit is reduced by 5.
Stacks duration.
This {@variantrule Boon|GW2} corrupts into 1 round of {@variantrule Blindness|GW2}.

variantrule.name: Poison
entries: {@variantrule Condition|GW2}
A poisoned creature takes poison damage at the start of each of its turns.
The amount of poison damage is determined by the effect that applied it.
While you are under this {@variantrule Condition|GW2}, you regain only two-thirds of the hit points you would normally heal.
Stacks intensity.
This {@variantrule Condition|GW2} get converted into 2 rounds of {@variantrule Regeneration|GW2}.

variantrule.name: Protection
entries: {@variantrule Boon|GW2}
While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule Boon|GW2}, you reduce all damage you take by an amount equal to your proficiency bonus (to a minimum of 1 damage).
Stacks duration.
This {@variantrule Boon|GW2} corrupts into 3 stacks of {@variantrule Vulnerability|GW2} for 2 rounds.

variantrule.name: Quickness
entries: {@variantrule Boon|GW2}

While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule Boon|GW2}, you gain one additional action on your turn. That action can be used only to take the Attack (one weapon attack only), Dash, Disengage, Hide, or Utilize action.
Stacks duration.
This {@variantrule Boon|GW2} corrupts into 1 round of {@variantrule Slow|GW2}.

variantrule.name: Vigor
entries: {@variantrule Boon|GW2}
While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule Boon|GW2}, you gain a bonus to your AC and Dexterity saving throws equal to you PB.
Stacks duration.
This {@variantrule Boon|GW2} corrupts into 2 stacks of {@variantrule Bleeding|GW2} for 2 rounds, dealing damage equal to the half the PB of the creature who corrupted the Boon.

variantrule.name: Regeneration
entries: {@variantrule Boon|GW2}
While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule Boon|GW2}, at the start of your turn, if you have at least 1 hit point, you regain hit points equal to your PB.
Stacks duration.
This {@variantrule Boon|GW2} corrupts into 1 stack of {@variantrule Poison|GW2} for 2 rounds, dealing damage equal to the half the PB of the creature who corrupted the Boon.

variantrule.name: Slow
entries: {@variantrule Condition|GW2}

While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule condition|GW2}, on your turn, you can take either an action or a bonus action, but not both. If you take the Attack action, you can make only one attack regardless of the number of attacks you can normally make.
Stacks Duration.
This {@variantrule Condition|GW2} converts into 1 round of {@variantrule Quickness|GW2}.

variantrule.name: Vulnerability
entries: {@variantrule Condition|GW2}
While you are under the effect of this {@variantrule condition|GW2}, you take 1 additional damage whenever you take damage.
Stacks intensity.
This {@variantrule Condition|GW2} converts into 1 round of {@variantrule Protection|GW2}.
